Description: Body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery phiale mesomphalos; white slip; interior glazed black; part of rosette and lotus flower in added white outline with added red centres; below, band of lozenges alternating red and white between white bands; exterior reserved with three brown lines.
Curator's comments: For parallels regarding the exterior decoration, see University College London, UCL 364.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 306, no. 1219)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1962) (phase 2)
